name: Ettercap
description: The Ettercap is a twisted, humanoid spider-like creature with a hunched body, long claws, and a grotesque face featuring mandibles capable of spinning webs.
memorable: Ettercaps are skilled trappers, weaving intricate webs to capture their prey, including unsuspecting adventurers.
goals: To lie in ambush and capture prey using webs and cunning tactics.
relations: Often found alongside giant spiders and other arachnids, under their command.
environment: Dark forests and caves, often making their lairs among the remains of past victims.
strengths: Excellent at ambushing foes with stealth and climbing abilities; can control the battlefield with webs.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits tactical options; average defenses make it vulnerable when caught out in the open without webs.
attacks: A Multiattack style using Bite and Claw strikes, along with debilitating webbing for restraining foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to restrain and control enemies with webs, drastically altering combat dynamics.
senses: Possesses Web Sense, knowing the location of any creatures in contact with its webs.
skills: Good at Stealth and Perception, allowing it to effectively navigate and ambush prey.
additional_information: Can command and communicate with spiders nearby.
Utilizes Spider Climb to navigate vertical surfaces effortlessly.
The webs it produces have specific weaknesses, making their destruction tactical.
Known for creating lairs filled with the cocoons of past victims.
Cunning predator that relies on stealth and traps.
